situation: A container holds two layers of different liquids, one having specific gravity of 1.2 and the other having a specific gravity of 1.5. A solid spherical metal having a diameter of 200mm and specific gravity of 7.4 is submerged in such a manner that half of the sphere is on the top layer and the other half in the bottom layer of liquid.

subquestions.question: Evaluate the buoyant force acting on the sphere, in kN.
Determine the tension in the cable attached to the sphere to normal position, in kN.
If both liquids are water, evaluate the buoyant force acting on the sphere, in kN.
